title: The ex-lecturer whose threats moved UCLA classes online for a day is in Colorado, LAPD chief says - CNN
content:
1. The ex-lecturer whose threats moved UCLA classes online for a day is in Colorado, LAPD chief says  CNN
  2. Mass shooting threat prompts UCLA to cancel in-person classes  KTLA 5
  3. UCLA Reverts To Remote Learning Following Threats From Former Instructor  CBS Los Angeles
  4. Former UCLA lecturer appears to threaten mass shooting  Los Angeles Times
  5. UCLA department cancels in-person classes after apparent mass shooting threat: report  Fox News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The former University of California at Los Angeles lecturer who made threats that forced UCLA classes online Tuesday is in Colorado, with the FBI and others now "furthering their investigation involving his engagement in (these) dangerous and reckless criminal activities," Los Angeles Police Chief Michel Moore said.
